attributes.action: Make the government support the NHS further financially to prevent cancellations
attributes.additional_details:
'Hip operations only for those in so much pain they can't sleep under new NHS rationing plans' - http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2017/01/26/hip-operations-much-pain-cant-sleep-new-nhs-rationing-plans/
'ambulance services were failing to hit a target of 75 per cent of ambulances on the scene within eight minutes' - http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/nhs-ambulance-services-national-audit-office-jeremy-hunt-crisis-a7546211.html
attributes.background: Due to a lack of funding and increasing pressure, many doctors and nurses within the NHS are struggling under the pressure whilst surgeries are being cancelled due to a lack of space and/or funding. The government needs to fund further and support the NHS to ensure it does not reach breaking point.
